steps.title: Use famous quotes about cousins that say it all.
steps.content: Use famous quotes about cousins that say it all. If you canâ€™t find the right words to use as a caption for your cousin, use any of these brilliant quotes. No matter what.â€ â€” Unknown â€œCousins are not those we do not know but instead part of a family that also provide support and comfort.â€ â€” Byron Pulsifer Friends might choose you at some point in your life, but cousins loved you from the start.â€ â€” Unknown â€œIf you ever want to see a piece of your childhood, just look at your cousins.â€ â€” Unknown â€œThe love of a cousin holds a lifetime of memories.â€ â€” Unknown â€œCousins are the friends that will stomp through the mud with you as a child and hold your hand as an adult.â€ â€” Unknown â€œFriendship is the only cement that will ever hold cousins together.â€ â€” Woodrow Wilson â€œCousins are people that are ready-made friends, you have laughs with them and remember good times from a young age, you have fights with them, but you always know you love each other, they are a better thing than brothers and sisters and friends cause they are all pieced together as one.â€ â€” Courteney Cox â€œCousins are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.â€ â€” Ed Cunningham [1] X Research source

steps.content: Use your favorite song lyrics to show your cousin how fun they are. The lyrics donâ€™t have to mention cousins, per se. steps.title: Express your genuine emotions.
steps.content: Express your genuine emotions. Think about how much you love your cousin and communicate those feelings clearly. Your writing doesnâ€™t have to be flowery, but can easily touch their hearts with some authenticity and love. What youâ€™ll send up with is a very special message your cousin will always remember and be thankful for.

steps.title: Use humor to be entertaining.
steps.content: Use humor to be entertaining. Since your cousin isnâ€™t the only one reading your Instagram captions, itâ€™s good to be funny so everyone can enjoy your words. Joke around with your cousin in a way theyâ€™ll understand, but make your caption clear so itâ€™s not only successful with one person. Your audience (especially your cousin) will love everything you say and laugh out loud.

steps.title: Choose words that are appropriate to the photo.
steps.content: Choose words that are appropriate to the photo. When posting a photo with your caption on Instagram, make sure your words match up correctly. Donâ€™t show a road trip photo when you want to offer birthday wishes for your cousin or bring up a memory of when you were little while posting a recent photo. Be sure your words work with the image so your cousin and others stop and look at what youâ€™ve posted.

steps.title: Bring up personal shared memories.
steps.content: Bring up personal shared memories. You have a ton of sweet, funny, and interesting memories youâ€™ve shared with your cousin over the years. Use your favorite one to express how long it took for you to get your cousin to like you . It may involve family get-togethers, private talks, or time spent goofing around. Whatever memory you choose, be sure itâ€™s one your cousin will want to read about and be ok for others to read as well.

steps.title: Keep your captions short and sweet.
steps.content: Keep your captions short and sweet. Long, drawn-out Instagram captions never do as well as brief, snappy ones do. You donâ€™t need to write a long paragraph. Instead, focus on a sentiment, event, memory, or idea you want to share about your cousin. From one-word captions to short ones using smiley faces, you have a lot of choice here to make it special in a few words. Include hashtags if you want others to see more of your message to your cousin. Emojis are also a fun and colorful way to liven up your captions about your cousins on Instagram.
